Title: Bubble Sort
Description: Need to sort the array using bubble sort

Title: Comb sort
Description: Need to sort array using comb sort

Title: Quick Sort
Description: Need to sort the array using quick sort

Title: Merge Sort
Description: The array needs to be sorted using merge sort

Title: Binary Search
Description: It is necessary to find the index of the required element using binary search. An array of strings sorted in lexicographic order is passed as input.
